name: Army Criminal Transport Van 3D
description:
Army Criminal Transport Van 3D.
In this game you will pick prisoner from one camp and drop the other camp.Drive a different police van and pick the prisoner.you can use the airplane for criminal person and move them from one country to another country.this is a good game for driving the different prisoner van and airplane.first select the bus then reach the camp where you pick the prison.when you will pick the prison and drop near to the airplane.prison will go to the plane and then you will ready for flying the plane.
Take off the airplane in the sky and reached your destination.this is a good game for driving and flying the airplane.
Game Feature:
Good control of the prisoner van.
Good control of the airplane flying.
Beautiful environment and graphics.
Realistic Sound effect of the prison van.
Realistic Sound effect of the Airplane.
